00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00054     public sealed class DiscreteUniformDistribution : DiscreteDistribution
00055     {
00056         int _a;
00057         int _b;
00058         int _n;
00059 
00060         #region Construction
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065         public
00066         DiscreteUniformDistribution()
00067             : base()
00068         {
00069             SetDistributionParameters(0, 1);
00070         }
00071 
00080         public
00081         DiscreteUniformDistribution(
00082             RandomSource random
00083             )
00084             : base(random)
00085         {
00086             SetDistributionParameters(0, 1);
00087         }
00088 
00093         public
00094         DiscreteUniformDistribution(
00095             int lowerLimit,
00096             int upperLimit
00097             )
00098             : base()
00099         {
00100             SetDistributionParameters(lowerLimit, upperLimit);
00101         }
00102         #endregion
00103 
00104         #region Distribution Parameters
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110         public int LowerLimit
00111         {
00112             get { return _a; }
00113             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _b); }
00114         }
00115 
00121         public int UpperLimit
00122         {
00123             get { return _b; }
00124             set { SetDistributionParameters(_a, value); }
00125         }
00126 
00130         public
00131         void
00132         SetDistributionParameters(
00133             int lowerLimit,
00134             int upperLimit
00135             )
00136         {
00137             if(!IsValidParameterSet(lowerLimit, upperLimit))
00138             {
00139                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00140             }
00141 
00142             _a = lowerLimit;
00143             _b = upperLimit;
00144             _n = _b - _a + 1;
00145         }
00146 
00153         public static
00154         bool
00155         IsValidParameterSet(
00156             int lowerLimit,
00157             int upperLimit
00158             )
00159         {
00160             return lowerLimit <= upperLimit;
00161         }
00162         #endregion
00163 
00164         #region Distribution Properties
00165 
00166 
00167 
00168         public override int Minimum
00169         {
00170             get { return _a; }
00171         }
00172 
00176         public override int Maximum
00177         {
00178             get { return _b; }
00179         }
00180 
00184         public override double Mean
00185         {
00186             get { return 0.5 * _a + 0.5 * _b; }
00187         }
00188 
00192         public override int Median
00193         {
00194             get { return (_a + _b) / 2; }
00195         }
00196 
00200         public override double Variance
00201         {
00202             get { return ((double)_n * _n - 1.0) / 12.0; }
00203         }
00204 
00208         public override double Skewness
00209         {
00210             get { return 0.0; }
00211         }
00212 
00216         public override
00217         double
00218         ProbabilityMass(
00219             int x
00220             )
00221         {
00222             if(_a <= x && x <= _b)
00223             {
00224                 return 1.0 / _n;
00225             }
00226 
00227             return 0.0;
00228         }
00229 
00233         public override
00234         double
00235         CumulativeDistribution(
00236             double x
00237             )
00238         {
00239             if(x < _a)
00240             {
00241                 return 0.0;
00242             }
00243 
00244             if(x <= _b)
00245             {
00246                 return (x - _a + 1.0) / _n;
00247             }
00248 
00249             return 1.0;
00250         }
00251         #endregion
00252 
00253         #region Generator
00254 
00255 
00256 
00257 
00258         public override
00259         int
00260         NextInt32()
00261         {
00262             return this.RandomSource.Next(_a, _b + 1);
00263         }
00264         #endregion
00265     }
00266 }
